/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures, painted in hues of orange and beige, rise high into the clear blue sky. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the right side of the street, trees provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a setting sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
